com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

类 DefaultClickListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api.DefaultClickListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener

    public class DefaultClickListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener
    The default click listener. Its default behavior is to send a mouse click event to the cloud when the user triggers `onClickDown()`, and to send a mouse button release event to the cloud when the user triggers `onClickUp()`. You can use `setMouseKey(MouseKey)` to switch the mouse button type. The default type is the left mouse button.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
